This game is about slacking as many flames as possible. For every fire you slack you gain points, but note: if your waterjet hits a bird or a cat your points will decrease.


CONTROLLER 
-Using the direction-buttons you can move your firefighter left or right.


-Tilting your smartphone forward or backwards will change the length of your waterjet.


-Tilting your smartphone to the left or to the right will change the direction of your waterjet.


WATER PRESSURE 
-As soon as your water tank is empty, your smartphones switches to the pumping-minigame. In this game you have to alternately push the left- and right-buttons until your water tank is full again. Then your smartphones automatically switches back to the normal playing screen.


-It is also possible to switch manually in the pumping-minigame and back. Therefore you can press the pumping-button on the bottom right of your playingscreen. To go back to the playin gscreen you can push the same button or the back button of your smartphone.


NOTE: 
To play this game it is necessary to install the PC-version on your computer. Your smartphone and the Game-Server have to be in the same WiFi-network. The IP adress of the Game-Server must be "192.168.1.105".



Good luck and have fun!
